mapper.insert: insert into t_food_type (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, PARENTID, ISNODE, FOODTYPECODE, FOODTYPENAME, FOODTYPEFOR, FOODTYPERULE, REMARK) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isnode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{foodtypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foodtypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foodtypefor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foodtyperule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_food_type set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISNODE = #{isnode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FOODTYPECODE = #{foodtypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODTYPENAME = #{foodtypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODTYPEFOR = #{foodtypefor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODTYPERULE = #{foodtyperule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, PARENTID, ISNODE, FOODTYPECODE, FOODTYPENAME, FOODTYPEFOR, FOODTYPERULE, REMARK from t_food_type where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, PARENTID, ISNODE, FOODTYPECODE, FOODTYPENAME, FOODTYPEFOR, FOODTYPERULE, REMARK from t_food_type
